step-start.title: Dates & Flight
step-start.description: We need the following information to help us give you the best possible flight experience with the highest level of safety.
step-start.pleaseChooseFlightFirst: Please choose a Flight Date first...
step-start.noAvailableFlights: No Schedule available for this date. Please call us.
step-start.photosvideos-description: Filmed with GoPros on specially built sticks for some great memories! (optional {price}.00 CHF per person)

step-timeslot.title: How Many Flying?
step-timeslot.description: Add the number of passengers to the times you would like to fly.
step-timeslot.large-group-tip: You can split larger groups over multiple times.
step-timeslot.total-passengers: Passenger in total | Passengers in total
step-timeslot.swipeRightLeft: (Swipe left/right to change the Flight Date)

step-info.title: Your Details | Your Group's Details
step-info.description: We only ask for the passenger information that we need to help make your flight fun, easy and enjoyable. We never share any information with 3rd parties.

confirm.title: Please Review & Confirm your Booking Details
confirm.description: Please check that your Booking information is correct, especially your Phone Number and Email (otherwise we can't contact you if we need to adjust your booking due to weather, etc.)
confirm.name: Name
confirm.confidence-hover: Your ability to run a few steps for take off.

country-codes.click-for-prefixes: Click for list of World's Country Code prefixes...
country-codes.title: Country Phone Prefix Codes
country-codes.details: Here's a listing of valid Country Code prefixes for reference. Double-click to select a Prefix.

step-pay.title: Place Order
step-pay.description: Review your order and press the PAY NOW button to to complete your payment.
step-pay.meetingTime: @ All meeting times are at our office, located inside the Viktoria Center across from Zermatt's main train station (just down the hall from the COOP Supermarket).
step-pay.specialWishes: If you have any questions, special wishes or have extra information regarding a passenger (for example a passenger with a disability), please click the Special Requests below and enter your message.
step-pay.specialRequestsDesc: Special take off times and/or locations, passengers with disabilites, or just general questions...
step-pay.tc-text-start: Check here to indicate that you have read and agree to the

step-thanks.title: Thank you!
step-thanks.description: Your payment succeeded & your order is complete.
step-thanks.orderSentTo: Your order confirmation has been sent to:
step-thanks.checkSpamStart: Please make sure to check your email
step-thanks.checkSpamEnd: folders if your order confirmation doesn't arrive (emails can take a bit of time to arrive sometimes)
step-thanks.ifAnyProblems: If you have any problems with your order, please contact us at:
step-thanks.orCallUs: or give us a call at:
